item.name: DataSet1
item.query: SELECT ALLOWED CashAssetsBalanceAndTurnovers.Company, CashAssetsBalanceAndTurnovers.CashCR, CashAssetsBalanceAndTurnovers.CashCR.CashCurrency AS Currency, CashAssetsBalanceAndTurnovers.AmountOpeningBalance, CashAssetsBalanceAndTurnovers.AmountClosingBalance, 0 AS AmountReceipt, 0 AS AmountExpense, CashAssetsBalanceAndTurnovers.AmountCurOpeningBalance, CashAssetsBalanceAndTurnovers.AmountCurClosingBalance, 0 AS AmountCurReceipt, 0 AS AmountCurExpense, CashAssetsBalanceAndTurnovers.DayPeriod, CashAssetsBalanceAndTurnovers.WeekPeriod, CashAssetsBalanceAndTurnovers.TenDaysPeriod, CashAssetsBalanceAndTurnovers.MonthPeriod, CashAssetsBalanceAndTurnovers.QuarterPeriod, CashAssetsBalanceAndTurnovers.HalfYearPeriod, CashAssetsBalanceAndTurnovers.YearPeriod, CASE WHEN CashAssetsBalanceAndTurnovers.Recorder = UNDEFINED THEN NULL ELSE CashAssetsBalanceAndTurnovers.Recorder END AS Recorder FROM AccumulationRegister.CashInCashRegisters.BalanceAndTurnovers(, , Auto, RegisterRecords, ) AS CashAssetsBalanceAndTurnovers

item.name: DataSet2
item.query:
SELECT ALLOWED CASE WHEN CashAssets.Recorder = UNDEFINED THEN NULL ELSE CashAssets.Recorder END AS Recorder, CashAssets.Company, CashAssets.CashCR, CashAssets.CashCR.CashCurrency AS Currency, CashAssets.AmountCur AS AmountCurReceipt, CashAssets.Amount AS AmountReceipt, NULL AS AmountCurExpense, NULL AS AmountExpense, 0 AS AmountCurOpeningBalance, 0 AS AmountOpeningBalance, 0 AS AmountCurClosingBalance, 0 AS AmountClosingBalance, BEGINOFPERIOD(CashAssets.Period, Day) AS DayPeriod, BEGINOFPERIOD(CashAssets.Period, WEEK) AS WeekPeriod, BEGINOFPERIOD(CashAssets.Period, TENDAYS) AS TenDaysPeriod, BEGINOFPERIOD(CashAssets.Period, MONTH) AS MonthPeriod, BEGINOFPERIOD(CashAssets.Period, QUARTER) AS QuarterPeriod, BEGINOFPERIOD(CashAssets.Period, YEAR) AS YearPeriod FROM AccumulationRegister.CashInCashRegisters AS CashAssets WHERE CashAssets.RecordType = VALUE(AccumulationRecordType.Receipt) AND CASE WHEN &EndOfPeriod = DATETIME(1, 1, 1) THEN CashAssets.Period >= &BeginOfPeriod ELSE CashAssets.Period between &BeginOfPeriod AND &EndOfPeriod END
UNION ALL
SELECT CashAssets.Recorder, CashAssets.Company, CashAssets.CashCR, CashAssets.CashCR.CashCurrency, NULL, NULL, CashAssets.AmountCur, CashAssets.Amount, 0, 0, 0, 0, BEGINOFPERIOD(CashAssets.Period, Day), BEGINOFPERIOD(CashAssets.Period, WEEK), BEGINOFPERIOD(CashAssets.Period, TENDAYS), BEGINOFPERIOD(CashAssets.Period, MONTH), BEGINOFPERIOD(CashAssets.Period, QUARTER), BEGINOFPERIOD(CashAssets.Period, YEAR) FROM AccumulationRegister.CashInCashRegisters AS CashAssets WHERE CashAssets.RecordType = VALUE(AccumulationRecordType.Expense) AND CASE WHEN &EndOfPeriod = DATETIME(1, 1, 1) THEN CashAssets.Period >= &BeginOfPeriod ELSE CashAssets.Period between &BeginOfPeriod AND &EndOfPeriod END
